Blockchain-based insurance uses smart co: Inshorar da ke kan blockchain tana amfani da kwangiloli masu wayo don sarrafa manufofin atomatik da sarrafa da'awa. Kuna biyan kuɗin shiga a cikin cryptocurrency ko kuɗin gargajiya, kuma ana adana sharuɗɗan manufofin a kan blockchain. Lokacin da wani taron da aka rufe ya faru (wanda aka tabbatar ta hanyar tushen bayanai kamar na'urorin IoT, bayanan yanayi, ko rahotanni na hukuma), kwangilar mai wayo tana sarrafa da'awar ku ta atomatik kuma tana ba da biyan kuɗi ba tare da sa hannun hannu ba.

Many claims are processed automatically: Ana sarrafa da'awa da yawa ta atomatik ta hanyar tsarin kwangilar mu mai wayo lokacin da bayanan da aka tabbatar suka tabbatar da taron da aka rufe. Don da'awar da ke buƙatar ƙarin tabbaci, kawai shiga cikin dashboard ɗin asusunku, kewaya zuwa sashin da'awar, kuma bi tsarin jagora. Kuna buƙatar samar da cikakkun bayanai game da lamarin da duk takaddun da ake buƙata. Ƙungiyarmu tana nazarin da'awar hannu nan da nan, yawanci cikin awanni 24-48.

Pay premiums and receive claims in crypt: Biyan kuɗin shiga kuma karɓi da'awa a cikin cryptocurrency ko stablecoins tare da ƙananan kuɗi da saurin sarrafawa.
Premiums are calculated based on several: Ana lissafin kuɗin shiga bisa dalilai da yawa ciki har da darajar kadarorin da ake inshora, takamaiman haɗarin da ake rufewa, bayanan tarihi, da kimanta haɗarin ainihin lokaci. Don wasu nau'ikan inshora kamar inshorar mota ko lafiya, za mu iya amfani da bayanai daga na'urorin da aka haɗa don ba da farashi bisa amfani wanda ke ba da lada ga aminci tare da ƙananan kuɗin shiga. Muna ba da ƙididdiga na musamman bayan ɗan gajeren kimanta haɗari.

We offer comprehensive coverage across m: Muna ba da cikakken rufi a cikin nau'ikan da yawa ciki har da kadarorin crypto, ababen hawa, gidaje, lafiya, tafiya, kadarorin kasuwanci, kadarorin ilimi, NFTs, dabbobi, da ƙari. Kowane nau'in inshora yana da takamaiman zaɓuɓɓukan rufi waɗanda aka tsara don keɓantattun haɗarin wannan ajin kadara. Tuntuɓe mu don cikakken jerin kadarorin da aka rufe a yankin da kuke sha'awa.
When a covered event occurs, verified by: Lokacin da wani taron da aka rufe ya faru, wanda bayanan duniya na gaske suka tabbatar, ana sarrafa da'awar ku ta atomatik kuma ana biyan ku.
Yes, we accept premium payments in major: Ee, muna karɓar biyan kuɗin shiga a cikin manyan cryptocurrencies ciki har da Bitcoin, Ethereum, da stablecoins kamar USDC da DAI. Hakanan muna ba da hanyoyin biyan kuɗi na gargajiya ga waɗanda suka fi son su. Biyan kuɗi na Cryptocurrency sau da yawa yana haifar da ƙananan kuɗi da saurin sarrafawa don kuɗin shiga da da'awa.
